Title: Sleep Manager
Description:
Win-based service for controlling time.
C# .net 4.5
HomeWiki:
Sleep Manager

- is a simple util for controlling time of using computer.

This Util build as Windows Service, and at specifying 'dream' time it will block mouse and keyboard and show annoying message 'YOU MUST GO TO THE BED!'

Certainly user can disable mouse and keyboard blocking by CTRL-ALT-DEL, but after 5 min (for example, also specified by user) that operation will be repeated
